medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient has complaints of photophobia and decreased vision since birth.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of photophobia and decreased vision have been present since birth. The current best-corrected visual acuity is 20/120 in both eyes. There is a noted presence of alternating exotropia and horizontal nystagmus.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a history of photophobia and decreased vision since birth.
